Articles.Content:
Someone asked me to make an 15-Eagle, so here you go. It is one of my most maneuverable crafts ever! It has comparable performance to my revised Ataraxia . Its really really acrobatic, very emphasized. Aside from that, it looks a bit like the F-15, but you should be the judge of that:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Test the maneuverability yourself:

http://download1325./99e5c0ddvpqg/7dhkcdf73a4gy2c/F-15+Eagle.craft
First time I saw the pics I thought it looked sorta like an F-22 Raptor lol. but yes this is VERY manueverable.
One question. How do you colour the wings? I know you used KerbPaint but I can only colour the 0.24.2 parts I cant colour the new wing parts etc.

One question. How do you colour the wings? I know you used KerbPaint but I can only colour the 0.24.2 parts I cant colour the new wing parts etc.

There was a link on the kerbpaint thread flying around with a download link to space plane us parts, so here I found it:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-%28September-23rd%29-%28Same-Old-Still-Works%21%29/page37

It gives you the ability to color any SP+ parts.
Thanks dude! Now my planes won't look half white half green...
Oh yeah, nice job with the wing! Could I use the wing of the F-15 on my next replica?
Sure. I don't care about using my stuff.
